title: China to Japanese official: If treated radioactive water from Fukushima is safe, ‘please drink it’
content:
1. China to Japanese official: If treated radioactive water from Fukushima is safe, ‘please drink it’  Washington Post
  2. Japan to release contaminated Fukushima water into sea | Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant | World News  WION
  3. Russia objects to Japan plan to dump Fukushima water, joining others  Business Insider
  4. US-Japan collusion on nuke wastewater disgusting: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. Commentary: Japan should behave responsibly to ensure safe oceans for all  The Star Online
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国から日本政府関係者へ：福島の放射性物質を処理した水が安全であれば「飲んでください
